Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Chicago/Wells-LaSalle
ShortDescription: #66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted EB: Chicago, Wells, Superior, LaSalle & Chicago; WB Chicago, LaSalle, Huron, Wells & Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Chicago/Wells-LaSalle.

Eastbound buses will operate via Chicago, Wells, Superior, LaSalle and Chicago.

Westbound buses will operate via Chicago, LaSalle, Huron, Wells and Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.
